sect1.title: Politics
sect1.para: Arguments happen. Politics are inevitable. How to deal with this, especially in communities where people like to think that they're immune to politics, or that if everyone would just look at the technical issues objectively "...they'd see that I'm right!" :-)

sect1.title: Forks
sect1.para: How to recognize when a fork is inevitable, how to prevent it when is isn't. Handling forks both amicable and hostile.
